level.heading: NONASSIGNMENT AND NONACCELERATION OF THE PRIZE (§ 30-607)

level.text: No rights of any person to a prize or a portion of a prize shall be assignable.
No payment of an annuitized prize shall be accelerated beyond the normal dates of payment, except as provided for in the POWERBALL® game in §908.4.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7439, 7447 (October 2, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 6959, 6960 (October 1, 1993).

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
